name: agentc
description: AgentC - Zero cognitive load from empty directory to shipped product. Self-bootstrapping /next → /do → /done loop.
author: Zero2One

commands.name: start
commands.description: Start autonomous execution - Claude drives, human executes assigned tasks

commands.name: assess
commands.description: Assess goal quality for autonomous execution readiness

commands.name: skill
commands.description: Create a new skill from recurring patterns

commands.name: next
commands.description: Get next optimal task from active goals

commands.name: do
commands.description: Execute current task with TDD discipline

commands.name: done
commands.description: Complete current task with verification

commands.name: skip
commands.description: Skip to queued task if blocked on current

commands.name: now
commands.description: Quick current task check (read-only)

commands.name: status
commands.description: Show all north stars, goals, and progress

commands.name: add-north-star
commands.description: Create north star with Socratic questioning

commands.name: add-goal
commands.description: Create goal with WOOP methodology

commands.name: focus
commands.description: Priority override for north star focus

commands.name: journal
commands.description: Log observation with auto-commit

commands.name: timer
commands.description: Control block timer (8-min focused work)

commands.name: commit
commands.description: Auto-generate commit message and commit

commands.name: commit-push-pr
commands.description: Full workflow: commit → push → create PR

commands.name: clean-gone
commands.description: Remove stale local branches tracking deleted remotes

commands.name: review-pr
commands.description: Comprehensive PR review with specialized agents

commands.name: ralph-loop
commands.description: Start autonomous iteration loop

commands.name: cancel-ralph
commands.description: Cancel active Ralph loop

commands.name: hookify
commands.description: Create hooks to prevent unwanted behaviors

commands.name: hookify-list
commands.description: List all configured hookify rules

commands.name: lock-and-deploy
commands.description: Lock plugin IP and deploy to marketplace
